verses.name: Psalms 60:6
verses.text: God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.

verses.name: Psalms 60:7
verses.text: Gilead is mine, and Manasseh is mine; Ephraim also is the strength of mine head; Judah is my lawgiver;

verses.name: Psalms 60:8
verses.text: Moab is my washpot; over Edom will I cast out my shoe: Philistia, triumph thou because of me.

verses.name: Psalms 60:9
verses.text: Who will bring me into the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?

verses.name: Psalms 60:10
verses.text: Wilt not thou, O God, which hadst cast us off? and thou, O God, which didst not go out with our armies?
